miniapp.name: Cardcart
miniapp.subtitle: Grocery list as cards
miniapp.description: A grocery list that behaves like a deck of index cards. See one item at a time: tap to mark bought (it slides away) or swipe to skip.
miniapp.ogDescription: A grocery list that behaves like a deck of index cards. See one item at a time: tap to mark bought (it slides away) or swipe to skip.
